ticket.title: rails and activeresource gems are missing license information
ticket.original-body:
Also the way of specifying the license is incoherent.
rails - missing activeresource - missing
activerecord - info in README.rdoc activesupport - info in README.rdoc railties - info in README.rdoc
activemodel - MIT-LICENESE actionmailer - MIT-LICENSE actionpack - MIT-LICENSE
